BMI CALCULATOR

BMI (Body Mass Index) is a simple calculation using your height and weight to estimate body fat. It’s calculated by dividing weight in kilograms by height in meters squared (kg/m²). Categories range from underweight to obese, providing a general indicator of health risk. However, BMI doesn’t account for muscle mass or body composition, so it’s a screening tool, not a definitive health diagnosis. Always consult a healthcare professional for personalized advice.
